import '../../App.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import './SignUp.css'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; const SignUp= ()=>{ const [inputField , setInputField] = useState({ username:'', name:'', contact:'', password:"", confrimPassword:"", emailid:"", }); const inputsHandler = (e) =>{ setInputField( {[e.target.name]: e.target.value} ) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { const data = { confirmpassword : confrimPassword, password : password, username: username, contact: contact, emailId: emailid, name: name } axios({ method: 'post', url:"http://localhost:8081/carwash/adduser", data }).then((resp) => console.log("resp",resp)) .catch(() => {}) e.preventDefault() } return( <>
